Title: Bendar's Rider of the Storm Support Build

ItemTooltips.blink: If you're getting owned, just blink in a spot where they can't kill you!
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Ward, ward, and ward some more, and never stop!
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Always have a Teleport Scroll in hand to turn those ganks around!
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Great item combined with Mana Boots, turns you into a fountain!

AbilityTooltips.disruptor_thunder_strike: Getting a second point at 3 makes herrasing even stronger.
AbilityTooltips.disruptor_glimpse:
Level 2 Glimps is much better then level 1 Glimps in range, making it actually decent to use until you've maxed out all the importent abilities first.

Try to use this after an enemy has teleported, it's the biggest troll thing you can do!
AbilityTooltips.disruptor_static_storm:
If you have enough farm, using this with Veil of Discord while the enemy is trapped in Kinetic Field under Thunder Strike is devastating.

Also, do not forget about the silence aspect of this skill which is often forgotten, it can be the differance between a win and a loss.
